sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO review_ratings_cache (interHash, number_of_ratings, rating_avg) VALUES (#interHash#, 1 , #review.rating#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rating_avg = (rating_avg * number_of_ratings + #review.rating#)/(number_of_ratings + 1), number_of_ratings = number_of_ratings + 1;
sqlMap.update: UPDATE review_ratings_cache SET rating_avg = COALESCE((rating_avg * number_of_ratings - #review.rating#)/(number_of_ratings - 1), 0), number_of_ratings = number_of_ratings - 1 WHERE interHash = #interHash#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM reviews_helpful WHERE user_name = #review.user.name# AND interHash = #interHash#
